nodes.text: A human female was the mother of Din Djarin. During an attack by Separatist battle droids, Djarin's mother and father escaped their home, and tried to hide their son from the droids. After hiding their son, Djarin's parents were killed, and Djarin was found by a B2-series super battle droid. However, Djarin was saved by a Mandalorian warrior, who took him in as a foundling.
